p:
Moreover, SwissADME tool showed that spirooxindole 6a fulfils the drug-likeness characteristics as defined by the major pharmaceutical companies ( Table 8) and passed their filters; Lipinski’s (Pfizer)
41 , Veber’s (GSK)
42 and Egan’s (Pharmacia)
43 filters, whereas it failed to pass Ghose’s (Amgen) filter due to two violations; molecular weight > 480, and molar refractivity >130
44 . However, it was not classified as lead-like because its molecular weight is higher than 350 and its predicted XLOGP3
45 exceeded 3.5.
